item.description:
OK .. sorry for the confusion everyone.. next time we'll do this a little differently - lesson learned. But we had to change the time. It was the only way they could accomodate all of us since it took us so long. Not anyones fault. Just a PIA. - So our Zip is at 330 but we can meet at 2-230 to hang out and that gives us some leeway just in case anyone gets lost or has to take a lot of potty breaks on the way up.

After we zip our asses off we will go for dinner and drinks at the Warfield House which is about a mile away.

but here is the website - there are 3 levels of Zips... the kiddy, the intermediate and the valley tour that goes from mountain top to mountain top. One of the runs is over  2000 feet long and about 185 feet high. But you can go on whichever one you like. I will work out the logistics soon but be prepared to prepay if you want to go. Columbus day weekend will be a crowded time and we will ahve to reserve the spots early.

http://berkshireeast.com/

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Zip Lining in the Foliage
